div1.p: UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT WESTERN DISTRICT OF WASHINGTON NORTHERN DIVISION
In Re Marie Robina Grayson, alias Marie Robina, for WRIT OF HABEAS CORPUS. ) No.2780. STIPULATION

IT IS STIPULATED by and between Noah Shakespeare, Esq., attorney for the above named petitioner, and Clay Allen, attorney for Henry M. White, Respondent, that the stay of twenty days granted and directed in an order entered in this cause on the 20th day of July, 1914, be, and the same hereby is extended for an additional period of fourteen days, or to and inclusive of August 21, 1914, and the respondent herein is given to the date last mentioned to enter an appeal in this cause.
And the bond heretofore given by the above named petitioner is hereby extended to August 21, 1914.
Signed in duplicate this day of August, 1914.
IN THE DISTRICT COURT OF THE UNITED STATES FOR THE WESTERN DISTRICT OF WASHINGTON
In Re Marie Robina Grayson alias Marie Robina, for WRIT OF HABEAS CORPUS.
FILED IN THE U. S. District Court, Western Dist. of Washington, NORTHERN DIVISION AUG 7-1914
div1.ab: FRANK L. CROSBY, Clerk By EML Deputy
